rooms.description: An open reception area welcoming guests, aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy. The entrance is oriented towards the south-east to invite wealth and prosperity.
A spacious living room with minimalist decor and ample natural light. Windows on the south-facing wall provide sunlight and ventilation.
Modern minimalist kitchen designed for efficiency, with an open layout connecting to the dining area. The positioning adheres to Vastu guidelines by placing it in the southeast quadrant.
A compact dining area that integrates with the living space, designed for social gatherings and casual meals.
A functional bathroom near the living area, ensuring privacy and convenience. Its location is optimized to avoid water stagnation in accordance with Vastu.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor layout, offering ample parking space and easy access. It respects local building norms and Vastu by being placed on the west side.

openings.description: A double-entry system that aligns with Vastu principles for positive energy flow. The main entrance is located on the east face to invite auspiciousness.
Multiple strategically placed windows and sliding glass doors ensure cross ventilation and abundant natural light. Windows are aligned to the south and west faces as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the central courtyard. Its positioning in the north-east corner adheres to Vastu for prosperity and health.
A secondary bedroom offering comfortable space, situated on the south-west corner as per Vastu principles to balance energies.
A multipurpose study or guest room located in a quiet area of the first floor, ensuring minimal disturbance and good natural lighting.

openings.description: Balcony windows provide a view of the central courtyard, enhancing light and air circulation in accordance with Vastu principles.
An open staircase connecting ground floor and first floor, designed to be unobstructed for smooth energy flow.
